data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Kostroma, Russia.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kostroma, Russia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Kostroma, Russia who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.section_summary: On average, 54 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Kostroma, Russia.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Kostroma, Russia from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Kostroma to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Akkin people. Make the Akkin people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Kostroma, Russia will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Kostroma, Russia so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kostroma, Russia has a population of 667,600.

We estimate Kostroma has 9,770 people who might know Jesus, 374,712 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 283,118 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Kostroma.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.
